_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The cause and condition for the corrupti: Sentient beings lust after form because it is pleasurable
They become caught up in it and become corrupted
The cause and condition for the purifica: Sentient beings grow disillusioned with form because it is painful
Desire fades away and they become purified
